ResourceHeader.ResourceName: VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna (2-turn) with a 15 m tower at Kagoshima, Japan
ResourceHeader.Description: A VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna (2-turn) with a 15m tower operated for 2001 - October 2009. Sensitivity peak at 2-8 kHz with a notch at 7 kHz. Original recording was in analogue tapes till 2003, and in analogue mini disk for 2004 - 2007, and digital data is available after 2008.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of this observation, Prof. Shiokawa before using the data.
